item.title: [Resolved] Status Page Switch
item.description: We’ve updated our status page to cState!

item.title: Cluster Maintenance
item.description: Some nodes of the Borg cluster are currently inactive. Sysadmins are working on restoring the cluster to full operation.
item.content: Some nodes of the Borg cluster are currently inactive. Sysadmins are working on restoring the cluster to full operation.

item.title: [Resolved] JupyterHub Down
item.description: JupyterHub is currently unable to spawn instances on any of the CSL’s computing clusters. We are investigating the issue and hope to bring JupyterHub back online soon.
item.content: JupyterHub is currently unable to spawn instances on any of the CSL’s computing clusters. We are investigating the issue and hope to bring JupyterHub back online soon.

item.title: [Resolved] DNS Changes
item.description: We are currently deploying significant changes to our DNS configuration. Users of CSL services may experience issues with networking.
item.content: We are currently deploying significant changes to our DNS configuration. Users of CSL services may experience issues with networking.
